title: Replace dull dark-wood background with an engaging futuristic furniture-themed backdrop

requirements.text: Update the global site background to feel more engaging and futuristic while still matching the furniture/interior theme (improve on the current dull dark-wood look) and keep all page content readable.

quotes: I think it has goes in dull can you make background something like that will attract people engagement and also it should match with our content which is furniture .. it has to give look like futuristic something ..

acceptanceCriteria: All pages using SiteLayout render with the updated, more engaging futuristic furniture-themed background.
Foreground text and UI elements maintain good contrast/readability against the new background (no major sections become hard to read).
The existing layout structure (Header, Footer, page sections) remains intact; changes are limited to background/styling.

requirements.text: Wire the updated background asset into the global layout by updating SiteLayout and global CSS so the new futuristic background image is used instead of the current wood-dark-bg image.

quotes: can you make background something like that will attract people engagement
it has to give look like futuristic

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayout.tsx uses the new generated background filename via publicAsset(...) for the '--wood-bg-url' background image.
frontend/src/index.css (.wooden-bg::before / ::after) is adjusted as needed (e.g., overlay/opacity/gradient) to complement the new background and preserve readability.
The app builds successfully and the background renders correctly in production routing/base-path scenarios (still using publicAsset).

requirements.text: Align the Home page hero background treatment with the new global futuristic furniture aesthetic so the hero section does not feel visually disconnected from the updated site-wide background.

quotes: it should match with our content which is furniture
it has to give look like futuristic

acceptanceCriteria: HomePage hero background/overlays (including the existing hero background image layer and gradients) are adjusted so the hero looks consistent with the updated global background style.
No new user-facing copy is added/changed; only visual styling/imagery treatment changes.
Hero text and CTA buttons remain clearly readable on common screen sizes.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Do not edit immutable hook files (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts / .tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep all images as static assets in the frontend (do not serve images via the backend).
nonGoals: No backend changes (Motoko actor remains unchanged).
No new pages, routing changes, or feature additions beyond background/theme refinement.
No third-party integrations or animation systems beyond existing Tailwind/CSS usage.

edits: Make the existing dark wood background feel more futuristic and engaging while remaining furniture/interior themed; add subtle modern geometric/tech accents and lighting while keeping it dark and premium (wood-dark-bg.dim_1920x1080.png > wood-futuristic-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
